title: Enable tracing and script autograd tests
body_html:
This commit adds additional pathways to the autograd tests to test
when the methods are run inside of a trace, or directly written using
script. These tests have uncovered many bugs and limited functionality
in the trace/script pathway, and these failing parts of the tests
are disabled using new exclusion sets. The size of these sets will shrink
rapidly as the bugs are fixed, but are currently quite large.

Rather than use gradcheck, these tests just compare trace/script gradients against the autograd. This approach is faster, so the test_autograd tests do not run appreciably slower with them enabled.

body:
This commit adds additional pathways to the autograd tests to test
when the methods are run inside of a trace, or directly written using
script. These tests have uncovered many bugs and limited functionality
in the trace/script pathway, and these failing parts of the tests
are disabled using new exclusion sets. The size of these sets will shrink
rapidly as the bugs are fixed, but are currently quite large.

Rather than use gradcheck, these tests just compare trace/script gradients against the autograd. This approach is faster, so the test_autograd tests do not run appreciably slower with them enabled.
